title: Cosy Newcastle Escape near Sparkling Waterfront
description: Explore the heart of sunny Newcastle from the comfortable and convenient haven of ibis Newcastle, set between the city’s namesake beach and the sparkling Hunter River. Stroll down to the shoreline of Nobbys Beach, wander around the Foreshore Park or even visit Nobbys Lighthouse with ease. Put your feet up with a drink in hand or treat yourself to a tasty meal at the hotel’s Hummingbirds Restaurant and Bar after the day's adventures. Ideal for the solo traveller, or a couple keen on discovering all the beauty on offer in Newcastle, this cosy escape will ensure you’re always well-rested.
offer_address: 700 Hunter Street, Newcastle West 2302, New South Wales, Australia

title: Relaxing Newcastle Escape with Daily Breakfast & Bottle of Wine
description:
A port city renowned for its golden sand beaches, historical architecture and beautiful working harbour, Newcastle on the coast of New South Wales is a charming destination. Located at the epicentre of the Hunter Region, Newcastle offers both cosmopolitan and laidback experiences and is less than an hour's drive from wine tasting in the Hunter Valley and whale watching in Port Stephens.

Escape the busy everyday pace and embrace one of Australia’s oldest and most-loved cities at The Executive Inn, and enjoy daily breakfast and a complimentary bottle of McWilliam's wine on arrival.

title: Grand Opening: Stylish QT Escape near Newcastle Beach with Daily Breakfast
description:
Embrace everything old and bold with a five-star escape to the brand-new QT Newcastle. Breathing new energy into a century-old heritage building, the hotel offers whimsical luxury in the heart of Newcastle's historic East End, surrounded by sensational surf beaches, a knockout bar scene and spectacular harbourside views. Savour sky-high whiskey highballs and locally sourced sashimi at Rooftop at QT, taste the best of vineyard and valley at Jana Restaurant & Bar or hit up the hotel’s iconic ‘Directors of Chaos’ concierge staff to discover your next adventure. 

Wherever you turn, QT’s signature vivacious interior design - inspired by Newcastle’s own industrial history - and meticulous attention to detail transform the ordinary into the extraordinary. When you’re ready to explore, Newcastle’s many delights await - glamorous sands and some of Australia’s best surf await at Newcastle and Mereweather Beach, both only a few minutes away, or travel just two hours north to the Hunter Valley for rolling emerald countryside, unforgettable wines and balloon-filled morning skies.

title: Grand Opening: Newcastle Ultra-Modern Waterfront Stay Near Nobby's Beach with Cheese Flight & Cocktails
description:
There's nothing little about these luxuries; be one of the first to experience the grand opening of one of Newcastle's most trendy city stays. This ultra-modern retreat is found in a vibrant neighbourhood just a short walk from Hunter Street, Nobby's Beach and the tranquil Newcastle Harbour. Wine lovers and culinary die-hards are perfectly placed to explore the mesmerising vineyards and regional producers of the Hunter Valley wine region from this incredible gateway. Between wine-soaked adventures, indulge with a refreshing tipple or two at the hotel's exclusive lounge bar, serving up interesting top-shelf selections and quick bites.

Appreciate the coastal surroundings with a calming stroll along the sparkling coastline, or venture further into the city via light rail to uncover the thriving arts scene at Newcastle Museum and a variety of energetic live music and performance venues. Take some time to relax in the dedicated guest lounge, or get some work done in the hotel's welcoming library space, boasting quiet booths and cosy couches. Stay on top of your health with a visit to the hotel's expansive Technogym wellness centre, or simply enjoy the view of the sparkling city from your stylish private space.
offer_address: 44 Honeysuckle Drive, Newcastle, New South Wales 2300, Australia

title: Relaxing Newcastle Escape with Complimentary Welcome Drinks & Onsite Parking
description:
Escape the everyday grind and embrace one of Australia's oldest and most-loved cities with a stay at Ibis Newcastle - an inner-city oasis offering an excellent location and modern facilities. 

Ideally situated in the city centre and only steps from a myriad of shops, restaurants, and cafés, this stylish sanctuary is the perfect launchpad for exploring Newcastle, wine tasting in the Hunter Valley, and whale watching in Port Stephens. A short walk to the Newcastle Foreshore, harbour and beach, and just steps from the Regional Museum, Art Gallery, and Civic Theatre, this is a stylish home away from home, where you can rest in complete comfort after long days of exploring.
offer_address: 700 Hunter Street, Newcastle West 2302, New South Wales, Australia

title: Relaxing Escape Just 15 Minutes from the Heart of Newcastle
description:
Escape the daily grind and embrace one of Australia’s oldest and most-loved cities with a stylish stay at The Executive Inn. Just a short stroll from the boutique shopping and cool cafés of New Lambton Shopping Village and a 15-minute drive from the heart of Newcastle, the hotel invites you to slow down and enjoy the cosmopolitan and laidback tranquillity that Australia's second-oldest city offers, with its golden sand beaches, historical architecture and a beautiful working harbour.

Why not take a dip in the outdoor heated pool, bliss out in the 12-seater spa or work up a sweat at the nearby Balance Collective Gym? Attached to the Wests' Leagues Club, The Executive Inn lets guests enjoy a wide range of fine dining, casual eats, bars and entertainment options.

title: Boutique Newcastle Heritage Escape
description:
An old soul with a fresh twist, The Lucky Hotel weaves unique charm and cheeky aesthetic through the bones of a grand 1800s building, creating a visual feast and top-rated experience - currently ranked in Tripadvisor's top two B&Bs in Newcastle - that promises to win the hearts of Newcastle locals and visitors alike.

Be where the luck is... underneath the snare drum chandelier hanging in the hotel’s stairwell, in the 30 boutique rooms complete with L’Occitane amenities and in the buzzing courtyard restaurant and bar. Lose yourself in the outdoor ambience with wreaths of glittering lights and lush foliage above, tea lights setting the mood, a Mexicali-inspired sharing menu tantalising the palate and creative bartenders delivering seriously tasty concoctions.

Then, stumble upon Hunter Street’s stylish eateries and hip bars, the crashing surf swells of Newcastle Beach, the history of the 19th-century Fort Scratchley and the Newcastle Art Gallery - all this is just a two-hour drive from Sydney.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Be wined and dined with A$20 daily food and drink credit for the hotel's Mexicali-inspired restaurant
- Toast your escape with a welcome bottle of wine in-room on arrival
- Complimentary bottled water so you can stay hydrated between gourmet delights
- Guaranteed 12pm late checkout so you can relax until the very end

title: Newcastle Coastal City Break
description: Discover the striking beaches and relaxed atmosphere of Newcastle with a stay at The Gateway Inn - a modern hotel nestled in the up-and-coming suburb of Mayfield, a short drive from Newcastle’s CBD and pristine beaches. This contemporary hotel is the ideal launchpad to Newcastle and its surroundings, including Fort Scratchley, Stockton Beach and Sand Dunes, and Blackbutt Nature Reserve. Enjoy a collection of modern rooms and apartments, plus convenient facilities including a fully equipped gym, free Wi-Fi, parking and bike hire to explore the area.

title: Boutique Central Newcastle Escape
description: Immerse yourself in Art Deco glamour and contemporary sophistication in the heart of Newcastle at the boutique Clarendon Hotel. Ideally located in Newcastle's thriving CBD, moments from the upscale eateries and pretty green spaces of Darby Street and the glistening Honeysuckle Boardwalk, this stylish hotel is the perfect starting point for discovering the sun-kissed beaches of the central coast and the Hunter Valley's rolling vineyards. When you're ready for a night in, Clarendon Hotel is home to a relaxed restaurant and courtyard serving flavoursome pub food and a 1930s-inspired Art Deco bar and beer garden with tantalising cocktails, craft beer and weekends of live music.

title: Smart Harbourside Stay near Newcastle City Centre
description: Unspoilt shorelines, an historic harbour and quintessential Australian hospitality are on offer at Holiday Inn Express Newcastle, an IHG hotel. Expect sandy feet and slow days when you explore this harbourside city, with sprawling greenery, endless nature walks and plenty of rich heritage. Take a stroll down the Newcastle Memorial Walk for glistening sea views, learn something new at the local museum or get up close to native animals at Blackbutt Nature Reserve.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Newcastle, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 514 King Street, Newcastle, New South Wales 2302, Australia

title: Contemporary Newcastle Airport Stay with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Bask in the modern comforts of this stylish hotel, conveniently located just a short walk from Newcastle Airport. Offering the perfect launchpad for exploring the charms of the Central Coast (or a comfortable stopover), savour a delicious meal at the onsite Mach One Restaurant and Bar, or keep up with your fitness routine at the well-equipped gym.

When it's time to explore, the stunning Stockton Beach, the historic Fort Scratchley and the bustling Hunter Street Mall are all within easy reach.
offer_address: 2 Williamtown Drive, Williamtown, New South Wales 2318, Australia

title: Boutique QT Escape in the Heart of Newcastle
description: A stunning mix of eclectic design and contemporary amenities await at the modern QT Newcastle, a boutique hotel only a short walk away from iconic Newcastle Beach. Saunter to the sand to discover why hundreds flock to its shore to surf and soak up the sun, or explore Newcastle's vibrant city centre - the hedonistic hotel is perfectly perched for both coastal and city escapes. QT's renowned maximalist aesthetic is on full display with a uniquely Newcastle touch, with design elements that pay tribute to the city's waterside location and steel industry history. Brushed copper and metal appear not only in the luxuriously appointed rooms, but across all communal areas, including the rustic Jana Restaurant and Bar. Indulge in sensational steaks and Italian favourites over dinner, before heading upstairs to the sleek Rooftop at QT bar for refreshing handcrafted cocktails with a backdrop of uninterrupted views across the harbour.

title: Laidback Newcastle Stay Moments from the Beach with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
description:
Experience the coastal charm of New South Wales with a stay at this perfectly positioned residence, on Newcastle's vibrant foreshore. This stylish hotel is just steps from the golden sands of Newcastle Beach, offering a serene retreat for those seeking a seaside escape. 

You'll find the the historic Fort Scratchley, the Civic Theatre and Newcastle Art Gallery within easy reach. After a busy day, return to your base to savour locally sourced cuisine and a glass of wine at the onsite Bistro Dalby.
offer_address: 5 King Street, Newcastle, New South Wales 2300, Australia

title: Newcastle Coastal Stay near Hunter River with Onsite Dining & Swimming Pool
description:
Welcome to your slice of harbourside heaven in Newcastle, set within a striking modern building. Imagine sophisticated spaces with a hint of maritime charm, a trendy all-day cafe at Distrikt Press, an inviting outdoor pool for sunny days and stylish rooms you’ll never want to leave.

Step outside into Newcastle’s most vibrant precinct. Begin your day with a refreshing dip in the Newcastle Ocean Baths, or explore the popular cafes on Darby Street for that perfect flat white. Ride the waves at Nobbys Beach, soak in the sunset views at Fort Scratchley and dive into the city’s renowned craft beer scene at hotspots like Foghorn Brewery.
offer_address: 12 Steel Street, Newcastle, New South Wales 2302, Australia

title: Vibrant Newcastle Elegance with Sophisticated Rooftop Restaurant & Bar
description: Experience the pinnacle of luxury in the heart of Newcastle, within easy reach of the historic Newcastle East, the vibrant Honeysuckle precinct and the stunning coastline. Dine at Romberg's, the hotel's sophisticated rooftop restaurant offering modern Australian cuisine and a Hunter Valley vineyard-inspired wine list alongside panoramic city vistas. Or sip on artisanal cocktails at Ms Mary, the chic cafe-by-day, wine-bar-by-night.
offer_address: 282 King Street, Newcastle, New South Wales 2300, Australia
